DOC.brief_title: Natural Cycle/Progesterone Fortified Protocol Endometrial Preparation Frozen/Thawed Embryo Transfer
DOC.detailed_description: Natural cycle/progesterone fortify protocol endometrial preparation frozen/thawed embryo transfer Study type : Descriptive pilot study novel protocol endometrial preparation frozen/thawed embryo transfer Introduction : In process in-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) cycle embryos frequently cryopreserved future attempt conception . In order embryo take root uterus , endometrial lining must make `` receptive '' embryo implantation . During natural reproductive cycle , process take place two stage . During endometrium 's proliferative phase , take place first 14 day 28 day cycle , estradiol produce grow follicle whereby thin endometrium remain menstrual cycle proliferate width 7 14 mm average , attain triphasic appearance ultrasound acquire receptor progesterone . After ovulation , ovarian follicle transforms corpus luteum produce progesterone . At stage , exposure progesterone transform endometrium one receptive embryo implantation . There minimum level progesterone minimum time exposure necessary transform endometrium receptive one prolong progesterone exposure render endometrium hostile implantation . The boundary time zone refer window implantation . The length time window unknown . There two strategy return frozen/thawed embryos uterus woman regular menstrual cycle . 1 . The natural cycle : In facility embryos cryopreserved 48-72 hour fertilization . In natural cycle protocol woman monitor estradiol , progesterone LH level blood endometrial thickness follicle development . The thawed embryo transfer uterus 48-72 hour presume ovulation rise progesterone 2 . Hormone replacement protocol : The patient give beta estradiol 2mg three time day ( Estrofem - Novo Nordisk ) first day menstrual cycle . This prevent indigenous follicle development one hand , sufficient prepare endometrium . When endometrium least 7 mm thick vaginal suppository progesterone administer 100 mg tid ( Endometrin - Lapidot ) 48 hour embryos transfer . If endometrium fail reach 7 mm , additional estrogen add . Since corpus luteum protocol , estradiol progesterone supplementation must give placenta produce hormones sufficient quantity . We maintain hormonal support 11.6 week gestation cycle pregnancy attain . The advantage natural cycle need take hormone . Nevertheless , note even though progesterone supplementation necessary natural cycle protocol , many IVF unit add progesterone support embryo transfer . A recent study demonstrate add progesterone natural cycle increase live birth rate ( Bjuresten et al . 2011 ) . Patients monitor day 10 14 follicular development daily home urinary kit provide detect LH surge . Three day detection LH surge thaw embryos transfer patient study group commence take vaginal progesterone . The disadvantage natural cycle IVF unit must prepare perform embryo transfer every day week include day unit close , accordance day ovulation . Delaying embryo transfer unit 's work schedule may cause embryo transfer take place outside endometrium 's window implantation . In hormone replacement protocol physician determines day patient begin progesterone supplementation , therefore day embryo transfer schedule accord unit work load . Furthermore need blood test patient monitoring . Ultrasound monitor usually limit two three visit . The hormone replacement protocol protocol choice unit . Rationale : Ovulation essential embryo implantation endometrial lining demonstrate hormone replacement protocol . In propose protocol develop follicle stimulate endometrial growth progesterone commence endometrial growth reach least 7 mm dominant follicle establish , regardless ovulation occur . Embryo transfer perform 48 hour begin progesterone . By dissociate protocol day ovulation great leeway achieve choosing day embryo transfer . Objectives : This pilot study novel protocol preparation endometrium frozen/thawed embryo transfer whereby estrogen administer proliferative phase progesterone administer vaginal suppository accordance endometrial thickness , disregard day ovulation . The primary outcome biochemical pregnancy rate . Secondary outcome include clinical pregnancy rate ongoing pregnancy rate . Intervention : We propose protocol endometrial preparation frozen/thawed embryo transfer combine advantage protocol . Patients receive estradiol therefore ovarian follicle production suppress . Progesterone supplementation commences endometrium least 7 mm , follicle demonstrate TVS , ovulation yet take place . The day ET schedule accord unit 's working day progesterone suppository commence 48 hour schedule embryo transfer . In order ensure synchronization endometrium embryo , embryo transfer 48 hour embryo transfer 48 hour progesterone therapy . This different current practice . Like natural cycle protocol , allow ovulation take place dependent day ovulation dictate u day embryo transfer , long begin progesterone supplementation time natural rise progesterone accompany ovulation . The progesterone supplementation dose identical standard protocol even ovulation suppress luteal support adequate . In protocol need daily blood ultrasound study . For patient , one visit around day 10-13 probably suffice schedule embryo transfer . Progesterone supplementation less intensive estrogen supplementation unnecessary . Recruitment : Recruitment study do investigator senior ob/gyn specialist IVF unit . Patients recruit woman cryopreserved embryos unit request frozen thaw embryo replacement cycle . No recruitment outside unit take place , transfer frozen embryo unit include therefore advertise necessary . Inclusion criterion : 1 . Women young 39 time cryopreservation 2 . Regular menstrual cycle least 26 day 32 day . 3 . Women 3 fail prior embryo transfer 4 . Patients embryos cryopreserved 48 hour ovum pick Exclusion withdrawal criterion 1 . Women know uterine malformation significant myomas 2 . Women elevate Progesterone least 1.5 ng/mL duration 72 hour embryo transfer perform 3 . Women suspect endometrial pathology base previous treatment cycle i.e . `` thin endometrium '' , polyp , adhesion 4 . Women whose embryos survive thawing process , i.e . embryo available transfer thaw 5 . Women without follicular development Protocol : A blood sample estradiol , progesterone LH take day 10 - 14 28 day cycle well TVS study endometrial thickness ovarian follicle . The day first visit adjust accord length cycle . Based test physician determine active follicle formation prior ovulation . Evidence active follicle formation include clear follicle least 12 mm estradiol least 80 pg/ml . If endometrium least 7 mm , ET schedule . If endometrium le 7 mm patient invite second visit 1-3 day later . Should evidence ovulation already take place , progesterone level 1.5 ng/ml sonographic evidence corpus luteum , cycle cancel . If evidence follicular activity first visit menstruation ; i.e . estradiol 80 pg/ml follicle demonstrate ultrasound , patient withdrawn study . Progesterone suppository ( Endometrin ) , 100 mg 3 time day commence 48 hour schedule embryo transfer day pregnancy test 14 day later . All embryo transfer do abdominal ultrasound guidance . At time embryo record size lead follicle whether attribute corpus luteum . Once pregnancy confirm progesterone support continue 11.6 week three time day . Blood sample sonographic study do need embryo transfer . HCG , progesterone estradiol measure 14 day embryo transfer 16-17 day pregnancy detect . An ultrasound perform 5-6 week confirm presence gestational sac 6-7 week confirm heartbeat . Data collect pregnancy termination delivery . Sample size : The biochemical pregnancy rate FET unit patient age group 24 % . A sample size 40 patient provide 13 % accuracy pregnancy rate . Recruitment end 40 patient complete protocol stage embryo transfer . Up 75 woman recruit order assure 40 patient complete protocol . The primary endpoint biochemical pregnancy rate . Secondary endpoint include implantation rate clinical pregnancy rate . For purpose comparison cohort patient study undergoing traditional hormone replacement preparation analyze . All patient data keep confidential researcher . Patient research file kept locked closet IVF unit . Patients names ID number replace patient code database submit statistical analysis .
